[{"type":"header","data":{"text":"DFP External Storage","col":12}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Save all your files within external S3 compatible buckets.","col":12}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"- All files to same bucket. Create one \"External Storage\" and select folder \"Home\". All uploaded files will be placed within that bucket.
- Specific bucket for specific folder. Create one \"External Storage\" and select your desired folder. All files uploaded to that folder will be located within that bucket.
- Files uploaded to folders without an associated External Storage will be uploaded to Frappe server filesystem.

","col":12}},{"type":"header","data":{"text":"Options","col":12}},{"type":"card","data":{"card_name":"Files management","col":6}},{"type":"card","data":{"card_name":"Settings","col":6}}]
label: External Storage
name: External Storage
title: External Storage
